name: Plan Your Future Now LLC
overview:
Plan Your Future Now, LLC engages in in individual and business consulting and electromagnetic research.

Plan Your Future Now, LLC (PYFN) conducts motivational seminars, classes, and workshops. PYFN research focuses on monitoring how changing Earth’s changing magnetism affects the Autonomic Nervous System (ANS). PYFN has twice presented research results at Michigan State University.

PYFN currently studies and researches in the realm of Social Media. Although this aspect is a relatively new endeavor, its focus has garnered interest from both lay individuals and professionals. As this work expands, PYFN anticipates a need to broaden its professional base.
